div.h3: Welcome to Mallard Creek STEM Academy
div.p: Mallard Creek STEM Academy promotes high academic achievement by increasing student engagement through a workshop model that encourages and empowers students to take ownership of their own learning.

h2.a: Attention Future Mallard Creek STEM Academy Families!

div.p: Dear Future Mallard Creek STEM Academy Families! Our sincere hope...
Charlotte-Mecklenburg Schools will provide grab and go meals while schools...
Board of Directors Meeting was re-schedule as a Conference Call...

h2.a: Tours and Events postponed at MCSA

div.p: Attention Parents and Guardians, All Tours and Events at Mallard...
Important information, Titans and future Titans. Our Parent information for...
